info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 2 at 9:24PM CDT until August 3 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Birmingham AL
info.description:
FFWBMX
The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Northeastern Calhoun County in east central Alabama... Northeastern Cleburne County in east central Alabama... Southeastern Cherokee County in northeastern Alabama...
* Until 1230 AM CDT.
* At 924 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 3 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar and emergency management.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Piedmont, Forney, Pleasant Gap, Eastern Weiss Lake, Spring Garden, Borden Springs and Waterhouse.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 12:30 AM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 12:30 AM CDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun, AL; Cherokee, AL; Cleburne, AL

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 12:30 AM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 12:30 AM CDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun, AL; Cherokee, AL; Cleburne, AL
